Description: {{PageRef|Other|alt_name=General}}

* Applying a CC to an enemy is reduced in duration when affected by other CCs in a short interval. Each previously applied CC reduces the duration by 7% up to a max of 21% over the past 7 seconds. CC is defined as the same set of debuffs that affect {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}} (stun, sleep, immobilize, tether, etc). Note that abilities that apply multiple things only count as one CC (aka {{PageRef|Abrams}} shoulder charge CC on the grab and the stun, {{PageRef|Lash}} ult grab and stun, etc).
* Matchmaking updates to include more considerations for a balanced roster beyond only frontliners
* Reduced shooting lock-out period when jumping from 0.15s to 0.0s
* Shooting while jumping now applies a -10% inaccuracy period for 0.15s after jumping
* Wall Jumps after the first one now cost 0.5 stamina (first wall jump per sequence is free)
* Reduced corner boosting velocity by 20%
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} base HP increased from 12500 to 13000
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} damage resistance per second reduced from 50 + 7/min to 35 + 5/min
* {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} bonus HP reduced from 15% to 10%
* 2nd {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Midboss}} rejuv credits reduced from 4 to 3
* Dropped Unsecured {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} bags now require a Heavy {{PageRef|Melee}} to secure rather than standing ontop of them
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Urn: Carriers now have +30% bullet and +30% spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Urn: Movespeed bonus reduced from +7m to +3.5m
* {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} Urn: Damage taken when holding too long increased from 1% to 1.5% Max Health per second
* Added an extra boon at 12k (nearby boon levels adjusted slightly, 10.2/11.6/13.2k to 10/11/12/13.2k)
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} {{PageRef|Shop}} no longer gets disabled if an enemy is nearby
* Distance to attack {{PageRef|Walker}}s reduced from 35m to 34m

* Fixed ordering issues with various items with Bullet based Procs. Debuffs (ie. negative Bullet Resist) from all procs are now applied before any bonus damage from the procs. {{PageRef|Item}}s include {{PageRef|Weakening Headshot}}, {{PageRef|Crippling Headshot}}, {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}, {{PageRef|Headhunter}}, {{PageRef|Hollow Point}} and {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}.
* Enabled input buffering for shooting, dashing, {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} and parry. This allows input to register before the current action is finished
Heroes
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Siphon Life}} damage and spirit scaling reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Siphon Life}} heal ratio increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} T1 changed from +25% Weapon Power to +20 Bullet Damage Per Shot (results in a weaker followup {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} hit)
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Add footsteps to {{PageRef|Billy}}'s out of combat run animations
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Base move speed reduced from 7.3 to 7.1
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} T1 movespeed increased from +1.75 to +2.25m
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Base bullet damage increased from 1.9 to 2.0
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} radius increased from 2.5m to 3m
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} duration increased from 14s to 16s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} height increased from 1.5m to 2.5m
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} cooldown reduced from 100s to 90s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} radius increased from 7m to 7.5m
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Doorway}} placement has been improved
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Doorway}} can now be placed through {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=veil}}s again
* Doorman: Improved performance when placing {{PageRef|Doorway}}
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Stalker's Mark}} new sound added for teleport precast
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Stalker's Mark}} replaced temp whizby sound with an updated version
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Stalker's Mark}} ambush cast delay increased from 0.0s to 0.35s
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} height increased from 0.7m to 1.0m
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Rejuvenating Aurora}} spirit scaling per level increased from 0.372 to 0.4
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} spirit scaling reduced from 1.11 to 1.0
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} T3 spirit scaling reduced from 1.11 to 1.0
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Rain of Arrows}} no longer lingers the air benefits like unlimited air dash once the ability is canceled or runs out
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.15 to 0.11
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Spirit scaling per boon increased from 1.1 to 1.2
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} DPS reduced from 55 to 50
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} T3 DPS reduced from +46 to +40
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Stone Form}} damage spirit scaling increased from 1.0 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} no longer grants allied bullet resistance (still grants barrier on drop)
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 18.9 to 17.8
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Clip size reduced from 15 to 14
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Spirit Power per boon increased from 1.1 to 1.3
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Essence Bomb}} spirit scaling increased from 1.07 to 1.22
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} range reduced from 11m to 10m
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} cooldown increased from 19s to 21s
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} damage reduced from 70 to 60
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: New {{PageRef|Heavy Melee|alt_name=heavy melee}} animation
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Rake}} now passively lets you float in the air with the umbrella for up to 2.5s with right click
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Rake}} heal spirit scale reduced from 1.5 to 0.5
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Rake}} T2 now also increases heal spirit scale by 1.0
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Rake}} T3 damage increased from 6% to 7%
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Sanguine Retreat}} cooldown increased from 27s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Nox Nostra}} now has 50% reduction in damage against objectives
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Nox Nostra}} reduced the Cap on objective damage from the T3 from +50 Damage per Bat to +20 Damage (only a nerf against objectives)
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} is now affected by cooldown reduction
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: Bullet damage growth per boon increased from 0.063 to 0.07
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Burrow}} bullet resistance reduced from 80% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.4s
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} T2 duration reduced from 0.75s to 0.7s
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: Bullet projectile speed increased by 15%
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.8 to 0.66
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Defend and Fight!}} duration increased from 5s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Defend and Fight!}} cooldown increased from 26s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Captivating Read}} reduced cooldown from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Captivating Read}} moved the UI element to the bottom of the screen so it's more noticeable when you get hit
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Captivating Read}} radius increased from 7m to 7.5m
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Conjure Dragon}} now properly applies burning effect below the dragon if the dragon is far off the ground
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Rallying Charge}} damage reduced from 150 (+1.2) to 125 (+1.0)
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Rallying Charge}} healing reduced from 150 (+2) to 125 (+1.6)
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Rallying Charge}} both damage & healing now grows as the horses travel, up to a max +100% of both at 350m
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Rallying Charge}} increased horse speed from 1700 to 2000
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Rallying Charge}} reduced knock-up speed from 800 to 600
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Rallying Charge}} spawn-in time reduced from 0.15s to 0.05s to remove deadzone in front
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} T2 reduced from +8m to +7m
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Power Surge}} spirit power scaling reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}}’s Lightning Strike damage reduced from 90 to 75
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}}’s Lightning Strike spirit power reduced from 1.4 to 0.5
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: Base health changed from 680 (+41 per boon, max of 1992) to 720 (+39 per boon, max of 1968)
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Pain Battery}} fixed the bolts hitting world geometry more often than intended
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Pain Battery}} damage required to charge up reduced from 50% max health to 40%
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} reduced DPS spirit scaling on the minimum damage from 0.25 to 0.22 and on the maximum damage from 1.25 to 1.1
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} self damage reduced from 100% to 85%
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} increased stun duration from 1s to 1.5s
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} damage spirit scaling increased from 1.8 to 2.0
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} T1 changed from "+10 spirit damage per bullet and 25% fire rate until reload" to "
+3m Radius and +100 Damage"
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} T3 changed from "+200 damage and +3m radius" to "+10 spirit damage per bullet and 20% fire rate while the ability is on cooldown"
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} improved hit detection
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} sometimes not hitting targets that are in the Z axis
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Base bullet damage increased from 11.4 to 11.8
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} duration increased from 13s to 15s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T2 increased from 7s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} spirit damage scaling increased from 0.19 to 0.22
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} bonus damage spirit scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.7
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} cooldown reduced from 60s to 50s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Alt fire base damage reduced from 48 to 42
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Alt fire damage growth increased from 1.25 to 1.6
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Splatter}} damage reduced from 80 to 70
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Splatter}} T1 increased from -5.75s to -6s
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} has been reworked
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} now stacks in both damage and slows the more daggers you hit against the same target
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} is now charge-based, with a 4.5s time between charges. Starts with 2 charges.
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} damage changed from 50 (+1) to 50 (+0.65) and 25 (+0.33) per stack
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} has a max stack of 3 (shows in overhead)
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} slow changed from 50% to 35% + 15% per stack
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} slow duration increased from 1s to 2s
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} cooldown increased from 9s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} T1 changed from -4s Cooldown to +1 Charge
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} T2 changed from +50 damage to -8% Bullet Resist, and -5% per Stack
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} T3 changed from +2s slow duration and -1 stamina to 40% CDR on hit
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} projectile speed increased from 3500 to 4200
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} updated sfx
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} added a pitch incrementor to impact sound. The sound will slightly increment in pitch relative to each stack that gets applied to a target.
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} can now be cast on non-trooper enemies (neutrals and objectives)
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} T3 upgrade can now trigger on all enemies, including troopers
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} T3 build-up per shot reduced from 5 to 4.5 (a nerf)
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Slither}} is no longer leveled up by default at the start of the game
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Slither}} T3 changed from 20% resists to “180 health barrier when initiating a slide”, has 0.6 spirit scaling, lasts 5s and 8s cd.
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Slither}} now leaves a green trail
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} DPS spirit scaling reduced from 1.45 to 1.3
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Fire rate spirit scaling increased from 0.22 to 0.25
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Base bullet damage increased from 5.115 to 5.4
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.175 to 0.155
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} delay reduced from 0.75 to 0.7
Items
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}: Damage reduced from 50 to 45

* {{PageRef|Backstabber}}: Cooldown increased from 5s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}: Damage reduced from 60 to 55
* {{PageRef|Cultist Sacrifice}}: Fire Rate reduced from 10% to 8%
* Cutlist Sacrifice: Fire Rate boon scaling reduced from 0.8 to 0.7

* {{PageRef|Cultist Sacrifice}}: Cooldown increased from 250s to 260s

* {{PageRef|Spirit Rend}}: Cooldown reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
* {{PageRef|Toxic Bullets}}: Burn increased from 2.1% to 2.2%
* {{PageRef|Blood Tribute}}: Heal reduction reduced from -40% to -30%
* {{PageRef|Tesla Bullets}}: Fixed proc rate being improved with general cooldown reduction
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Fixed proc rate being improved with general cooldown reduction
* {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}}: Spotted radius reduced from 26m to 20m
* {{PageRef|Spiritual Overflow}}: No longer grants +20% Ability Duration on proc
* {{PageRef|Spiritual Overflow}}: Now grants +20% Cooldown Reduction on proc
* {{PageRef|Extra Health}}: Bonus Health increased from 175 to 185

* {{PageRef|Spirit Lifesteal}}: Now provides +6 Spirit Power
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Boon scaling increased from 0.3 to 0.4

* {{PageRef|Weapon Shielding}}: Movespeed increased from 1.5 to 1.75
* {{PageRef|Spirit Shielding}}: Movespeed increased from 1.5 to 1.75
* {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}: Cooldown increased from 22s to 24s
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Heal reduced from 150 to 85
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Heal scale per boon increased from 4 to 6

* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Reveal on damage duration increased from 0.25s to 0.5s
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Initial invis fade duration increased from 0s to 0.25s
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Reveal on spotted duration increased from 0.25s to 1.25s
* {{PageRef|Counterspell}}: {{PageRef|Parry}} duration reduced from 0.9s to 0.8s
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Barrier reduced from 350 to 140
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Barrier now scales with Boons (10 scaling)
* {{PageRef|Rescue Beam}}: Cast range increased from 28m to 32m
* {{PageRef|Fury Trance}}: Cooldown increased from 16s to 18s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Resilience}}: Spirit Resistance increased from 25% to 30%
* Diviner’s Kevlar: Duration increased from 13s to 20s
* Diviner’s Kevlar: Spirit Power increased from +25 to +35
* {{PageRef|Cheat Death}}: Damage output reduction reduced from -70% to -60%
* {{PageRef|Cheat Death}}: Healing reduction reduced from -70% to -60%
* {{PageRef|Inhibitor}}: Buildup rate increased (now matches {{PageRef|Slowing Bullets}} buildup rate)
* {{PageRef|Inhibitor}}: No longer limited to hero only targets
* {{PageRef|Unstoppable}}: Duration increased from 5s to 5.5s
* {{PageRef|Colossus}}: Active resist increased from 30% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Colossus}}: Radius increased from 12m to 14m
* {{PageRef|Spellbreaker}}: Threshold increased from 150 to 175
* {{PageRef|Rusted Barrel}}: Cast range increased from 28m to 32m
* {{PageRef|Rusted Barrel}}: Bullet Resistance reduction increased from -6% to -8%
* {{PageRef|Mystic Burst}}: Cooldown increased from 12s to 14s
* {{PageRef|Quicksilver Reload}}: Bonus damage reduced from 55 to 44
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}}: Bonus damage reduced from 100 to 95
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}}: Cooldown increased from 24s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Mystic Slow}}: Now reduces dash distance by 10% (affects upgrades)
* {{PageRef|Disarming Hex}}: Cast range increased from 23m to 32m
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Silence duration reduced from 3.25s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Snatch}}: {{PageRef|Melee}} damage reduced from 10% to 7%
* {{PageRef|Greater Expansion}}: Spirit Resist increased from 8% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Spirit Burn}}: Now goes on cooldown for half the normal time when used on non-heroes (rather than 0 cooldown)

* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Jumpstart}} cooldown increased from 22s to 23s
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} self damage can no longer be reduced by spirit resistance (same as {{PageRef|Jumpstart}})
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} self damage reduced from 85% to 80%
* Fixed Wall Jumps not refunding stamina if a mantle or {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=zipline}} occurs within the refund window (similar to how we treat other stamina refunds)
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} self damage reduced from 80% to 70%
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} radius reduced from 8m to 7.7m
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} MinDPS, MaxDPS and spirit scaling increased by ~5-6%
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Jumpstart}} duration increased from 4s to 4.5s
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Shocking Reanimation}} radius increased from 12m to 13m
